original_text: When they stopped travelling, Moses said, ‘Return, Lord, to be near to the thousands of Israel's people.’
korean_text: 궤가 쉴 때에는 말하되 여호와여 이스라엘 종족들에게로 돌아오소서 하였더라

sentences.original_text: to be near to the thousands of Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 수천 명에게 가까이 계시려고
